text: Ara misariya ye tamke kinechila se tara strike balale -- ''sam'manajanakabhabe era thakabara jayaga kara, hayata se amadera upakare asabe, athaba take amara putrarupe grahana karate pari.â€™â€™ Ara e'ibhabe amara i'usuphera jan'ya basasthana thika kare dilama se-dese, yena tamke sekhate pari ghatanabalira byakhya sanbandhe. Allah tamra kajakarme sarbesarba, kintu adhikansa loke'i jane na.
